name: Noinun40
description:
Ludum Dare 49 Contribution

  • Do NOT Match-3
  • Do NOT put same elements close to each other
  • If you do things become UNSTABLE and might BREAK
  • You can choose one of two elements each turn
  • The spot to place is chosen for you

Everything done by Rafael Hernandez Pereira during the 48h game jam

  • Game Idea
  • Coding in C#
  • Graphics with Logoist 3 on Mac
  • Music with Galileo 2 and Magellan 2 on iPad (played directly on keyboard and recorded without any further editing)
  • Using Unity
  • Using 3 self developed libraries: random numbers, game loop template, pooling
